title: Wall Street dips at open after mixed earnings reports
text:
Wall Street dips at open after mixed earnings reports

Stock Markets 35 minutes ago (Oct 29, 2019 09:36AM ET)

(Reuters) - Wall Street opened slightly lower on Tuesday as investors assessed a mixed batch of earnings reports, including from Google-parent Alphabet (NASDAQ: ) and big drugmakers Merck and Pfizer (NYSE: ). The Dow Jones Industrial Average ( ) fell 29.65 points, or 0.11%, at the open to 27,061.07. The S&P 500 ( ) opened lower by 4.03 points, or 0.13%, at 3,035.39. The Nasdaq Composite ( ) dropped 12.64 points, or 0.15%, to 8,313.35 at the opening bell.

Wall Street dips at open after mixed earnings reports
description: Wall Street dips at open after mixed earnings reports
